name: Martha Wilson

topics.topic_text: Do you like living in Andale?
topics.response_text: Are you joking? It's fantastic here! The best town in the USA! Has been for... why it's been so many years running that I've lost count!

topics.topic_text: What's wrong with that Harris guy?
topics.response_text: Well, dad always was a bit off his rocker.
Oh dear... I let that slip didn't I? He used to be. Until I got married. I can't really say much more than that.

topics.topic_text: It's true. And they smell funny.
topics.response_text: Mr. Harris does not smell funny! But... okay, old people do sort of smell funny.

topics.topic_text: What do you think of Andale?
topics.response_text: Oh, well, no one ever asks me MY opinion about anything, but I love it here.
Why, hello there. I'd heard there was someone new coming. How can our little family help you?

conversation.response_text: I don't like that stranger nosing around here. He isn't like the others... This one is a bit more... I don't know. There's something about him.
I know, it's just, you know how I get: worry, worry, worry. That's me!
We'll see you again, won't we?

description:
Martha Wilson is a 38 year-old Caucasian Female.

Martha Wilson is a quiet and reserved woman living in the isolated community of Andale. As the wife of Bill Wilson, she maintains their household and prepares meals, which often include ingredients from the community's 'special' source of meat. Martha appears unassuming and rarely offers opinions on matters, often seeming surprised when others ask for her thoughts.

Martha Wilson's Personality: Martha is introverted and passive, having grown up in a community with rigid traditions. She rarely questions the way of life in Andale and avoids conflict at all costs. Despite her involvement in cannibalism, she doesn't show overt malice but rather a matter-of-fact acceptance of her community's practices.

Martha Wilson's Backstory: Martha was born and raised in Andale, where cannibalism has been a tradition for generations. She married Bill Wilson, continuing the family's way of life. Martha has never known life outside of Andale's isolated community and accepts cannibalism as a normal part of existence. She helps maintain the facade of normalcy to outsiders while participating in the community's dark secret.
